body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps           16th century explorers like Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo had to make do with rudimentary maps.  Today, current park maps are just a mouse click away! NPS Photo      To help plan your visit to Cabrillo National Monument, click on the following maps for park features and location.     PARK MAPClick here for a map of the park (PDF).     SURROUNDING AREA MAPClick here for a map of the surrounding area (PDF).
title: Cabrillo National Monument: Maps
